title: Ep 267 | Jase Throws a Party for Missy, and Phil Shows Up on Purpose
description:
Phil is all partied out, but Jase discovers there's one way to get him to show up at a celebration. Willie comes up with a clever way to lose $100 on his birthday. Phil is mighty impressed with his kids' ability to practice hospitality and put out a tasty spread. Jase is NOT a fan of focusing on people's sins and behavior before we even share who Jesus is. Al points out that many church leaders make it too difficult to come to Christ. And Phil has a theory on why many churches don't have balconies.
